TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class StateBag : System.Collections.IDictionary, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StateBag extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class StateBag Implements IDictionary, IStateManager
public ref class StateBag sealed : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type StateBag = class interface IStateManager interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 服务器控件（包括页面）的视图状态。

span.span: Manages the view state of ASP.NET server controls, including pages.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面或控件的视图状态是该页面或控件的累计属性值或视图。View state for a page or control is the cumulative property values, or view, of that page or control. 可以通过 属性访问此类。You can access this class through the property. 控件还可以在控件状态中存储基本状态信息，但这些信息并不存储为 对象。Controls can also store essential state information in control state, but that information is not stored as a object. 此类是所有 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件的主要存储机制。This class is the primary storage mechanism for all HTML and Web server controls. 它将属性/值对存储为与该控件关联的字符串。It stores attribute/value pairs as strings associated with the control. 仅在对页面请求执行 方法后，它才跟踪对这些属性的更改，并将更改保存到页面或控件的视图状态。It tracks changes to these attributes only after the method is executed for a page request, and saves the changes to the page's or control's view state. 此类实现字典，你可以向其添加项或从中移除项，就像处理任何字典对象一样。This class implements a dictionary, and you can add items to it or remove items from it as you would any dictionary object. 有关数据集合（如字典）的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](/dotnet/standard/collections/)。For more information about data collections, such as dictionaries, see [Collections and Data Structures](/dotnet/standard/collections/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个具有 `Text` 和 `FontSize` 属性的组合 `Label` 控件。The following code example demonstrates a composite `Label` control that has `Text` and `FontSize` properties. 当对控件调用 方法时，这些属性将保存到视图状态，并从视图状态检索。These properties are saved to and retrieved from view state when the method is called on the control. [!code-csharp[SysWebUIControlViewState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/CS/controlviewstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SysWebUIControlViewState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/VB/controlviewstate.vb#1)]

span.span: Collections and Data Structures
ASP.NET State Management Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置在 对象中存储的项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of an item stored in the object.
The specified item in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此成员是保存和检索控件或页的视图状态值的最简单方法。Using this member is the simplest way to save and retrieve view-state values for a control or a page. 如果在设置此属性时，项尚未存储在 对象中，则会将其键/值对添加到集合中。If an item is not already stored in the object when you set this property, its key/value pair is added to the collection. 如果将此属性设置为在对项调用 方法之前 `null`，则会将其从 对象中移除。If you set this property to `null` before the method is called on an item, it is removed from the object. 否则，当您将此属性设置为时 `null` 将保存该键以允许跟踪项的视图状态。Otherwise, when you set this property to `null` the key is saved to allow tracking of the item's view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个属性，该属性将其名称和值作为键/值对保存到 属性中。The following code example demonstrates a property that saves its name and value as a key/value pair to the property. 属性是 类的实例。The property is an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/CS/controlviewstate.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/VB/controlviewstate.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示 对象中的项的键集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of keys representing the items in the object.
The collection of keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些项是控件属性的名称。These keys are the names of the control properties. 例如，如果在自定义的 `Table` 控件上创建了 `BGColor` 属性，则会在此集合中创建一个 `BGColor` 项，表示 `Table` 控件上的该属性。For example, if you created a `BGColor` property on a `Table` control that you customized, a `BGColor` entry is created in this collection representing that property on your `Table` control. 这些项对应于当前页或服务器控件的 集合中存储的 对象的名称。These keys correspond to the names of the objects stored in the collection for the current page or server control. 您可以使用 方法循环访问此集合。You can iterate over this collection using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/CS/gotocs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/VB/gotovb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 还原以前保存的 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Restores the previously saved view state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原 对象的视图状态信息。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method. 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 您可以重写此方法以控制自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。You can override this method to control how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后，对 对象的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 的视图状态更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the .

returns.span: 如果没有更改，或 中没有 元素，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there are no changes, or there are no elements in the , this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在 HTML `Hidden` 元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的 属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85))和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

abstract member System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState : unit -> unit override this.System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪其状态的变更，以便该对象可在请求中一直留存。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its state so that it can be persisted across requests.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取存储在 对象中的视图状态值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the view-state values stored in the object.
The collection of view-state values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个集合，其中包含指定页面或控件中所有 对象的值。This is a collection that contains the values for all the objects in the specified page or control. 可以通过使用 方法来循环访问这些值。You can iterate through these values by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/CS/gotocs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/VB/gotovb.aspx#2)]
